definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[וְשׂ]]: consec. Pr 29:9; 3 pl. [[שָֽׂחֲקוּ]] La 1:7; Job 30:1; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִשְׂחַק]] Job 39:7 +, etc.; Inf. cstr. [[שְׂחוֹק]] Ju Jdg 16:24, Ec 3:4;—

definitions.title: l. a.
definitions.body: laugh at, usu. in contempt, derision, c. [[עַל]] pers. Job 30:1, Ps 52:8; [[עַל]] rei La 1:7 c. [[ל]] pers. God subj. Ps 37:13, Ps 59:9 (‖[[לָעַג ]]); c. [[ל]] rei vel pers.= have no fear of, Hb Hab 1:10, Job 5:22, Pr 31:25 also, fig., of noble animals Job 39:7, Job 39:18, Job 39:22, Job 41:21; abs., Pr 29:9 (opp. [[רָגַז]]), of ´[[י]]: Ps 2:4 (‖[[לָעֵג ]]), of wisdom Pr 1:26 ([[ב]] temp.; ‖ id.).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: c. [[אֶל]] pers., appar. of friendly laugh Job 29:24; in gen. Ec 3:4 (opp. [[בָּכָה]]).
make sport, Ju Jdg 16:25 ([[ל]] pers.) 2Sa 2:14 ([[לִפְנֵי]] pers.; in tournament), Pr 8:30 ([[לִפְנֵי]]), v:Pr 8:31 [[ב]] loc).

play: incl. instr. music, singing and dancing 1Sa 18:7, c ´[[לִפְנֵי י]]:. 2Sa 6:5 ([[ב]] instr.), = 1Ch 13:8, 2Sa 6:21, 1Ch 15:29 ( + [[מְרַקֵּד]]); of merry-making Je 15:17 (‖[[עָלַז ]]), Je 30:19, Je 31:4; of children’s sport Zec 8:5; of beasts Job 40:20, Ps 104:25; of man, play with ([[ב]]) crocod, Job 40:29.
